item.title: Flex and Grid in CSS
item.author: Author
item.description: Flex A Flexbox code Example display 1 2 3 .container { display: flex; } flex-direction 1 2 3 .container { flex-direction: row | row-reverse | column | column-reverse; } flex-direction flex-warp 1 2 3 .container { flex-wrap: nowrap | wrap | wrap-reverse; } flex-wrap flex-flow This is a shorthand for the flex-direction and flex-wrap properties.
